column4: Hey guys I have an Nvidia Geforce GT 540M graphics card and an intel card too (Samsung RF 711 laptop). I was wondering how do I have the system take my nvidia card instead of the intel card? I followed http://www.howopensource.com/2012/10/install-nvidia-geforce-driver-in-ubuntu-12-10-12-04-using-ppa/ but when I do that my display gets all buggy 640x320 display
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
